channel.title: Few commands I really really want
channel.description:
If there is a tutorial, link me to it.
First one, ::admin and ::mod, ::admin USER gives admin rights to user, ::mod USER gives mod rights to user.
Then I would like a construction tut.
Please and thanks
Wildfire -

item.title: Few commands I really really want
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

Anyone got the PvPScape source?

Read full topic

item.title: Few commands I really really want
item.dc:creator: @Wildfire Wildfire
item.description:
@Wildfire wrote:

[quote=“cant touch this93, post:3, topic:110218”][quote author=solidrune link=topic=157552.msg1480944#msg1480944 date=1181771928]
i don’t got these myself lol
but whats the point? you may aswell just go into char folder and make them mod/admin from there. then compile it… lol
if you dont know how to do dat then find a tut…i posted one sumwhere so dont say there is 1! lol
[/quote] that wont work,it would only corrupt the char file…

[quote author=Wildfire link=topic=157552.msg1480772#msg1480772 date=1181769980]
If there is a tutorial, link me to it.

First one, ::admin and ::mod, ::admin USER gives admin rights to user, ::mod USER gives mod rights to user.

Then I would like a construction tut.

Please and thanks

Wildfire -
[/quote] just make an admin handler and make the command add them to that folder…not that hard…[/quote]

Second thing makes no sense, and the first thing is total bullshit. It does work, thats how I’ve been doing it. Only my source doesn’t need to compile.

Read full topic
